entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Lacombe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:44 a.m. MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
